column1: The Pit Room////Hellooo BBQ in Houston!  The pit room is small
column3: but there's also street parking.  It's right down the street from Rice University!  I was there on a Saturday night and the place was popping
column4: but we all waited in line for our turn to order!  The brisket was moist but not fatty
column6: they had various offerings of sausage; turkey and pulled pork.  Sides included: Mac and cheese
